price: [Nagsabi si Allāh:] “O Juan, kunin mo ang kasulatan nang may lakas.” Nagbigay Kami sa kanya ng paghahatol habang isang paslit pa,
arabic: يَٰيَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيّٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāyaḥyā khudhi al-kitāba biquwwatin waātaynāhu al-ḥuk'ma ṣabiyyan
